name: Dyestributor (itch)
description:
The goal is simple. Connect the two color blocks and let the dye flow in between them. Although the goal seems simple, there are many obstacles that will block your path, Some that are immovable, some that are moveable, some that are explosive, and even exploring new areas.

Try your best to navigate through all 3 stages and all 20 levels, and even if it may not seem like it they are all guaranteed to be possible.

Developed by MoistButterFeet and ImAbstr4kt
